altername_name: Simple Characters 2000 Series Vol. 10: Sakigake!! Otojo Juku: The Dodgeball
name: Simple Character 2000 Series Vol. 10: Sakigake!! Otokojuku: The Dodgeball
overview: Simple Characters 2000 Series vol.10 - Sakigake!! Otojo Juku is a dodgeball game with characters from the popular anime, the game features a story mode and some vs modes, the game difficulty is really high. Game Modes: - Story Mode - 1 Player vs 2 Player - 1 Player vs Computer
